esef-5635_2020.value: SHOP APOTHEKE EUROPE N.V. is an online pharmacy  business primarily for prescription and non-prescription  (“over-the-counter” or “OTC”) pharmaceuticals, beauty  and personal care products (BPC) and food supplements.

esef-5633_2020.value: Erik de Rodeweg 11–13  NL–5975 WD Sevenum
